title: Checkbox
description: A clickable element that can function as either a hyperlink or a regular button.
intro: The Checkbox component is a versatile component that can function as either a regular button or an anchor link element. It can be configured in a variety of ways by adjusting properties such as size, color and more.

body.raw:
# Import
---
Import the Checkbox component using the following import statement.

```tsx
import { Checkbox } from '@rewindui@core';
```
